Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Septimo die mensis
Junij anno Domini Millesimo quadringentesimo Nonagesimo Septimo

The saide day William serray litstar thomas Robertsone Johne mvnk Jonhne
litstar Androw murray eldar and for him David murray Robert themdaile and Eduard'
top Ilkane of thame in ane Amerciament of the Court becaus' thai falyeit
in the waching of the tone' be thame and thar seruandis eftir the tenor of the
ak maid' tharapone Obefor for the quhilkis Ilkan of the saide personis
sale pay to the halie blud' licht j li' of wax Androw murray demi stane
and Johne litstar his mache ij li' and that thai pay the wax a thai pas'
out of the tolbutht and ij s' Ilkan persone to the balyeis for the vnlaw
And' thar seruandis to be put in the goif thar to Reman quhile vij
houris eftir novne and nocht to be lousit out of the goif quhile the saide houris
for nay request

The saide day the wyf of Jonhne blak the wyf of Sandy forbes margaret'
balcrome the wif of Jonhne Rede Wobstar Emy Kennartj tiby ruthirfurd'
medy baxtar alisone Cuming the wif of Sandy huchone Donalde
bandone Richerd Redheid' Ilkan of the said weman was in ane Amerciament
of the Court for the breking of commone ordinance and Spilling of the mercat
In bying of meile and tappin of it til alienaris and the saide Donald' and
Richard' ilkan of tham in Amerciament of the Court for the barrelling of meile and selling
tile alienaris And' the saide Dauid fynne in ane amerciament of the court be his tonge
grantit for the selling of meile In barrellis til alienaris be ane Suorne
assis' Johne Colisone forspekar for the Amendis of the quhilkis It was
ordanit and Statut that nayne of the said' weman be fundin in the mercat
vnto michelmes byand' meile and gif Ony of tham be comprehendit in the
said' mercat thai salbe takin be the Officiaris and put in the goif thar to stand'
xxiiij houris And' the saidez Donald' Richard' and Dauid Ilkan sal pay x s' to
Sanct nicholes werk and j li' wax to Sanct the halie blud' licht Ande
gif euire ony of tham thre beis conuikit for sic termys in tym to cum sal
pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem ix die Junij quo supra

The saide day It was thocht expedient statutit and ordanit be
the aldirman balyeis Consale and Communite for the Sayfte of the tone'
and the resisting of the ald' Inemeis' of Ingland' that ale that Inhabitis
this tone sale mak thar fossis and bastalye as it is fondit in
breid' In lintht fra the Southt havin to the northt havin with
help and Supple of our mastiris the channonis Ande that ane
blokhous' salbe bigyt of gret strintht at the havin moutht
ande that euere burges sal Inbring certane landmen outduellaris
and nocht Inhabitis this tone' eftir thar faculte and Sustene tham one thar
expensis to remane within the tone als' lang as neidis and that nay mane
borow nor lene geir vndir the payne of eschet Ande that euere
mane be weile abilyeit with defensabile wapinnis as efferis
eftir the tenour of our Souerane lordis lettres direkit tharapone And' that
ale burges batht to burghe and lande sal Remane personalie within
the burghe and nocht to pas' vteuche vndir the panys contenit in
our Souerane lettres direkit tharapon Ande that euere mane haue thar
targis and ale thar' geir' Redy at the premunicion and warning of the
common bell vndir the panis' contening in our Souerane lordis lettres
that is to say of tynsal landis lyve and gudis
Curia balliuorum tenta In pretorio eiusdem xij die Junij quo Supra

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Jonhne colisone
forspekar that Robert Ouchtirles wranguislie manvrit and occupeit ane
pece of land pertenit to margaret Rede be resone of coniunctfeftment
and to amend' as law wile and forbeir' in tyme to Cum for the
quhilkis he was in ane Amerciament of the court And the saide margaret set the
said' pece land' to Jonhne pet for an

the saide day Jonhne fechat was in ane amerciament of the court be ane
Suorne assis' William blinsel forspekar for the wranguis' oute
Castyne of ane tre out of ane Schip

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiiijo
Junij

The saide day mathow branche referit him to the stande
at the ordinance of the aldirman and consale for the selling of
j last of Ry meile tile alienaris in contrar' the commone
ordinance of the tone and oblist him be his hande to stand
tharto Ande the aldirman and consal deliuerit and ordanit that the
saide mathow sal pay xx s' and ij li' of wax to the haly
blud' licht or he pas' out of the tolbutht And' gif the
saide mathow or ony vthir Induellar' of this burghe committis
sic traspas and sellis or outputtis wittalis of this tone
and beis conuikit tharof Sal pay x merkis to Sanct nicho
les' werk vnforgevin

The saide day Jonhne smitht grantit and oblist him to pay
mak werk to Alexander Rede for xxij s' quhilkis he has tane
to pay to bessy bysset

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvj die
Junij quo Supra

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Alexander
Rede forspekar that mathow branche sal pay iij s' and ix d' of the
annuel of William blinsellis land' of the termes bigan

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Robert blinsele forspekar that Jonhne fechat sal pay iiij s'
for the Custome of ane of the ij barrelis salmond' sauld to the
franchman Ande the franchman the tothir iiij s' and gif euir the
said' Jonhne or Ony vthiris Careis' salmond or ony
vthir Stuf with thar avne Cobil or boitis without takin
of the Custom' salbe Removit out of this tone

The saide day Androw chamer grantit him aving j barrel of
Salmond sufficient merchand' gude to Dauid steuart to be
pait at the terme of lammes next hereftir the saide
Dauid pay gevand' to him iij f' of gret Salt

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvj die Junij
quo Supra

The saide day It was ordanit and deliuerit be ane suorne assis'
that Kytty barde salbe Removit expellit and forbodin the tone' for
hir' gret demeritis and traspas' committit tile diuers' personis and now
to medy heruy And' in likuis' scho was forbodin obefor

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' that anny set
was in ane amerciament of the court for the strubulance of Canny Cullan for the quhilkis
Scho sal pay ij s' to hir' amendis Ande gif euir scho faltis or committit ony
strubulance in tym to Cum scho sal pay vj s' and viij d' to Sanct nicoles
werk and scho be conuikit tharof
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem p vltimo die Junij

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit this day aucht dais
to alexander liell to ansuer' to the borghe' strekit one him be William
goldsmitht for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xxij s' and viij d'

the saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit this day aucht dais
tile henry bavne to ansuer' to the borghe strekit one him be Alexander
liel for the wranguis' haldin fra him of ane par of leg harnes ane
forgeir' and ane gorgeat perempturlie Ande gif he comperis nocht and ansueris
the saide day he sal deliuer the saide geir' to the saide Alexander

head.add: the statutis maid' for the resisting of Inglismen

div.p:
The ferde day of Julij the yer' forsaide It was ordanit and statute
be the aldirman balyeis and consal of abirdene and appreuit be the communite of the
samyn that gif the our ald' Inemeis of Ingland purpos' and schepis to
lande that the tone' keip tham obscur' and Suffer tham to lande gif it be seyne
expedient to the aldirman and the quartar masteris chosin be the towne
ofor' the kepin of the burghe and the Resisting of our saide Inemeis' that is
to say the aldirman ourman / Alexander menyes Robert blinsel Dauid menyes
Alexander Rede Jonhne of Culan Alexander of chamer Jonhne colisone thomas prat
William portar and Jonhne Wormet Ande the tone' salbe quarterit in four'
partis and cauellis Castyne for the wechin of the tone' and Ilkan quartar'
to waik thar nicht about

The saide day It was statut and ordanit gif the Inglismen purpos'
to lande one the northt partis of our havyne that al manere of men'
with thar cartis of weir' with hors' gunnys artalyerie and al vthir
defensabile wapinnis be redy and pas' to resist thame for the saifte
of our cathedral' kirk my lord of abirdenis palace cite our mastiris the
channonis and thar' familiaris and habitacionis

The saide day it was statut and ordanit that ale outburges for thar' non re
sidence personalie within the burghe salbe pvnist eftir the tenor' of our saide
Souerane lordis lettres of proclamacion maid' tharapone

The saide day it was statut and ordanit that ij kelis one the tovnis aventour'
be brocht to the neys' and al fishear' boitis be brocht and haldin one floit besid'
the said' kelis' to pas' and repas for the Saiftie of the mene and landis
of torry

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Septimo
die Julij anno quo Supra

The saide day William blinsel grantit him avand' to Androw Culan eldar'
xl s' for the ourgevin of the xvj s' and viij d' of annuell Rent of the land'
of vmquhil William moir' to the said William for be alison liell

The saide day Dauid murray Jonhne thomsone being Inquerit be the aldir
man and balyeis gif thai war' complanteous' one Jonhne litstar denyit
and saide thai war' nocht Complanteous' one the saide Jonhne

The saide day Jonhne litstar was in ane amerciament of the courtis for the strubulance
of the wache be ane Suorne assis' Robert blinsel forspekar and to Amend'
as law wile and forber' in tym to Cum

The saide day Dauid murray and Jonhne thomsone was quyt of al
strubulance of Jonhne litstar' be ane Suorne assis' Robert blinsel
forspekar'

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Robert blinsel
forspekar that Alexander liell sal pay xxiiij s' to henry bavne and he sal
deliuer him his legharnes gorgeat and forgeir'

the saide day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to Alexander liell
preiwe his allegeance pait of the said xxiiij s' to the saide henrik
befor thame

The x day of Julij yer forsaid' It was statut and ordanit be the
aldirman balyeis and consal for the resisting of our ald' Inemeys
of Ingland' that al nichtbouris of this burghe sale Inbring and sustene
Certane landmen and Ilkan eftir thar substance to the defence of the
tone agan the gret navy of Ingland ay and to the tyme the saide
nauy remoyve fra thir partis for the quhilkis thai haue chosin thir personis
Androw Culane yongar Jonhne Wormet Androw murray eldar Alexander
gray Dauid mathesone and William futhes taxtoris tile extent the
tone how mony personis landmen Ilkane mane sal beir' be thar
aithis bodelie suorne

The saide day It was statut and ordanit that al nichbouris and Induellaris
this burghe sal sende thar seruandis with spadis barrowis and schulis
to morne be houris in the morning to the saide nes' thar' be command'
of the aldirman and the Officiaris to cast fossis et cetera and Ilkan houshalder ane seruand'
at the lest Ande that al pynouris stabillaris and cartaris hevand hors' be
thar with thar' hors' and cartis to the furnysing of the samyn and that nay
hors be yekit vndir the payne of Eschet' and that nay buthtis be oppin'
for laboring nor wirking vnto the tyme the saide fossis be castyne
and maid' be the Sicht and commavnde of the aldirman balyes and consale
And that nay' Induellar' of this burghe pas' vteuche the tone vndir the
panys' contenit in our Souerane lordis of proclamacion And that al outburges
cum and reman personalie within the burghe' vndir the panys contenit in the samyn

the xiiij day of julij the yer' forsaide It was statut and ordanit be
the aldirman and Consale for the Sayfty of the tone' that thir personis vndir
writin sale be hedez of the wache In the first the xiij in nycht of Julij

The saide day it was Statut' and ordanit be the aldirman and consale
that the balyeis sal warne the wache nychtlie as thai wile ansuer
to the kinge and the tone and the sergeandis to be Redy at thar' commavnde And

secunde v nychtis Androw Culan the thrid v nycht and thomas fyf the

nay man to wark for thame vndir the panys contenit in our Soueran
lordis lettres directit tharapone that is to say of tynsal land lyve and
gudis

The saide day Robert meldrum parysonar of Ouchtirles lauchfullie summond'
be my lord of Abirdenis lettres deponit be his aithe that he was present
in fyve and herde and saw Wat Colp quhen he come to the priour' of fyve
and schew how he was avand' to William smitht' his seruand' part of wol
and besocht him to make Instance to the saide William to resaue ane
part of Skinnis fra him for the woll that he was avand' to him and the said'
William was laithe to resaue the saide Skinnis and thareftir be resauit the said
skinnis In pament of his said' woll and he handillit tham neuire quhile thai
war' deliuerit to him
William gentilman parysonar of fywe lauchfullie summond' be my lorde
of Abirdenis lettres deponit be his aithe et cetera in al thingis as the said Walteris
deposicion' beris
